title: Legendary Whitetails Men's Buck Camp Flannel, Long Sleeve Plaid Button Down Casual Shirt, Corduroy Cuffs
descriptions:
Product Name: Legendary Whitetails Men's Buck Camp Flannel

Experience the comfort and style of our Legendary Whitetails Men's Buck Camp Flannel. This long sleeve plaid shirt is not just a piece of clothing, but a statement of relaxed and casual fashion. The shirt features a classic button-down closure and a corduroy lined collar that adds a touch of sophistication. The corduroy cuffs provide a comfortable fit and a stylish finish.

Made from 100% cotton, this imported shirt offers a relaxed fit that ensures ease of movement without any pulling or tugging. The soft brushed cotton flannel fabric weighs 5.1 ounces, making it perfect for layering or standalone wear in both indoor and outdoor settings.

The double-pleated back design and the chest-waist highlight add to its stylish appeal. The shirt is designed with a classic single pocket that includes a pencil slot, providing a practical storage solution. The pocket design is also ideal for safeguarding sunglasses.

This shirt is not just about style, but also durability and maintenance. The pill-resistant and fade-resistant fabric ensures that the shirt retains its sharp look and lasting comfort. The corduroy lining enhances the shirt's durability, and the fit maintains its shape over time.

The shirt is true to the images and offers immediate comfort right out of the box, with no break-in period required. For optimal shrinkage management, follow the care instructions provided.

Refer to the size chart to ensure the perfect fit. This Legendary Whitetails Men's Buck Camp Flannel is more than just a shirt; it's a statement of style, comfort, and durability.
